sourcesContent:
import * as yup from "yup";

const basciSchema = yup.object().shape({
  username: yup.string().required("Required"),
  mail: yup.string.email("Please enter valid email ".required)("Required"),
  password: yup
    .string()
    .min(8)
    .matches(passwordRules, { message: "Please enter a stronger password" })
    .required("Required"),
  confirmPassword: yup
    .string()
    .oneOf([yup.ref("passwprd"), null], "Password much match")
    .required("Required"),
});
